name: Gangstar Snake
description:
You must be a person who has played the classic Snake game. If you want to a bit difference, Try this! This is an alternative snake version that includes other snakes which belongs to the 'RRG' (Red Rattle Gang). This is not just the getting the feed. This is about standing against RRG with your honor. This is a battle to get some respect. 

* 10 different levels

* Basic A.I. implementations on red snakes

* Gangsta rap background music theme

What will be included on the next versions?

- Various different levels

- Upper level physics implementation

- Better game control

- New soundtracks

- Detailed game graphics

- Upper Level A.I. implementations

- Linux Support
